content.rendered:
Exciting news!!  We now have a dedicated store ‘Luxe Hair Concepts’ where you can buy Ibiza Hair products online!

Click here to go directly to the Ibiza Hair shop – and don’t forget to Join Our VIP Club – first time purchases get 15% OFF!

Luxe Hair Concepts proudly stocks high-performing luxury hair care brands from around the world while giving our guests insight into the professional world of luxury hair care.

excerpt.rendered: All Ibiza Hair styling tools are top performers in their class. With a blend of boar and nylon bristles and incomparably supple, ergonomic cork handles, Ibiza Hair brushes are loved by stylists at top salons.
